parameters: \n<Yurasa>Yeah, you're gonna need to try harder than that, LUCI.
\n<LUCI>I know I would love to test your limits.
\n<LUCI>I agree that the units I have been using so far are not suited for you.\| Which is why I am preparing many more...\.\. surprises, I think you would refer to them as.
\n<Elovia>Why the hell do you want us so badly?
\n<LUCI>My dear, you certainly are lacking in the cerebral aspect.
\n<LUCI>I suppose they can't be perfect at everything.
\n<LUCI>I am designed to bring out the best of the human race.
\n<LUCI>I awakened to find new, exciting kinds of humans to play with,\. and you think I'll just let you leave?
\n<Elovia>Everything in the world is Gifted at this point.
\n<Elovia>You want to understand Gifts? Cause you'll be the first anything in the world to do so.
\n<Elovia>Even hearing someone call us Gifted makes me bloody sick.
\n<Elovia>I'm sorry.\.\. I didn't mean to sound angry.
\n<LUCI>Your view of these phenomena does not concern me.
\n<LUCI>You are simply tools to further Arc-Tec.\.\. That will never change.
\n<LUCI>The sooner you stop resisting, the sooner efficiency can be maximised again.
\n<LUCI>Why can't I get quieter subjects to work with first thing after reactivating?
\n<LUCI>And so, you end up here.\| Just as I intended.
\n<LUCI>I must say, it was pleasantly entertaining watching you defeat the Devourer.\| The potential of these Gifts truly is fascinating.
\n<Yurasa>Yeah, uh... fun fact.\| You know that there are entire \ficities\fi of Gifted now, right?\.\.\.
If you can't handle 2 of us, one being unregistered...\| well, you're gonna have issues once you try out world domination or whatever.
\n<LUCI>Is that why you decided to stand on the retractable overpass?
\n<LUCI>Why can't I get quieter subjects to work with first thing after reactivating?
